Step 1.Planning: Fill the cup with water from the sink

Step 2.Planning: Add 2 tablespoons of instant coffee to the cup

Step 3.Planning: Add 3 tablespoons of cane sugar to the cup

Step 4.Planning: Add 4 ice cubes to the cup

Step 5.Planning: Pour the cup contents into the blender

Step 6.Planning: Add a scoop of ice cream to the blender

Step 7.Planning: Blend all ingredients in the blender
